name: Modern Sniper Shooter 3d 2017
description: modern sniper 3d shooting is about sniper target, squads of enemy sharpshooter in 3d city sniper full of burglar to stop burglar. squad app is about modern sniper shooter shooting in 3d games pickle war attacking against mafia. 6x6 sharpshooter its a hard games challenge to strike sniper headshot as an us army sniper 3d commando under f18 fighter jet , tanks and helicopter bombing. strike sniper marksman ! against crime spree in warrior city sniper for headshots.
